committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for the preservation, restoration and interpretation of the historical, cultural and architectural values of the Town of Bramwell, West Virginia, for the educational and inspirational benefit of present and future generations.
short_title: Bramwell National Historical Park Act of 1990

summary.text: Bramwell National Historical Park Act of 1990 - Establishes the Bramwell National Historical Park, West Virginia, to preserve, restore, and interpret the unique historical, cultural, and architectural values of the town. Establishes the Bramwell National Historical Park Advisory Committee. Terminates such committee ten years after enactment of this Act. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Bramwell National Historical Park Act of 1990

To provide for the preservation, restoration and interpretation of the historical, cultural and architectural values of the Town of Bramwell, West Virginia, for the educational and inspirational benefit of present and future generations.
